column4: i wonder why they replaced pidgin with empathy if empathy has no support or plugins.
because people normally hates pidgin, and Canonical changes to another one... what is better, yes, but *new* version, don't change by old version, it hasn't got anything :s
yeah that's a bummer. OTR is good technology to be in a messenger.
I never used it, I sometimes use msn, normally I use irc, or just phone with friends heh
